SEARCH
Package com.blackjack.model

Class MongoDBManager

java.lang.Object
com.blackjack.model.MongoDBManager
public class MongoDBManager extends Object
MongoDBManager handles the database interactions for the Blackjack game, including user authentication, saving scores, and managing card collections.

      Parameters:

    • resetCardsCollection

      public void resetCardsCollection(String cardSuit)
      Resets the collection for the specified card suit (either 'ES' or 'FR').
      Parameters:
      cardSuit - the card suit (either 'ES' or 'FR')

    • loadCardsIntoCollection

      public void loadCardsIntoCollection(String cardSuit)
      Loads cards into the appropriate collection for the specified card suit.
      Parameters:
      cardSuit - the card suit ('ES' for Spanish cards or 'FR' for French cards)

    • saveUserScore

      public boolean saveUserScore(String username, String suit, int points)
      Saves the user's score to the 'scores' collection in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      suit - the suit of the deck used ('es' for Spanish, 'fr' for French)
      points - the points the player achieved in the game
      Returns:
      true if the score is saved successfully, false if an error occurs

    • getDatabase

      public com.mongodb.client.MongoDatabase getDatabase()
      Gets the MongoDatabase instance that is connected to the database.

      the MongoDatabase instance
